sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		FileName as string,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		Count as string,
		Year as string,
		Rate as string,
		sysETLrunId as integer,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysCreatedBy as integer,
		sysChangedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1
